title: dlhub
description: General metadata for the DLHub service

publication_date.description: Time when this model was submitted to DLHub, expressed as a UNIX timestamp (seconds from the Unix Epoch)

domains.description: Scientific application areas of the artifact

owner.description: Globus ID of the owner of the model

name.description: Short name of the artifact or servable

visible_to.description: List of entities that can view this artifact. Can either be a UUID specifying a Globus identity or 'public'

items.description: Identity allowed to see the artifact

anyOf.description: UUID of an allowed identity. Corresponds to a Globus User ID or a Group ID
Specification that model should be openly visible

id.description: Unique identifier for this artifact in DLHub. Used internally

transfer_method.description: Information for how to access data being published to DLHub

POST.description: Key of the file to be retrieved in the HTTP request.

S3.description: Location of the data on S3. All data must be present in a ZIP file

files.description: Files required to construct this servable

test.description: Internal use. Whether DLHub is actually going to do anything other than validate the request
